comment.body: Wouldn't believe anything commie-countries are saying.

@Tajny2z: any country which is a friend of North Korea, Russia, China, should not be trusted. Putin banned GMO because local market wouldn't be able to compete with GMO production because of their taste and other qualities.
UK has banned chloroquine export. In my part of the world you can't buy cholroquine from a pharmacy,  all sold out
@Tajny2z: either you're playing idiot or you are.
